name: quiniela-results
description: Module to obtain the results of the argentinian lotery from a given date. It can be executed as a CLI or consumed as any other npm module (including client-side implementations).

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run umd
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.umd: mkdir -p umd && npm run umd:development && npm run umd:min
scripts.umd:min: browserify -t babelify lib/index.js --standalone quinielaResults | uglifyjs > umd/quiniela-results.umd.min.js

author: Cristhian Javier Duran <durancristhian@gmail.com> (https://github.com/durancristhian)

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run check-vulnerable-dependencies && npm run dependency-check && npm run lint && npm test && npm run coverage && npm run check-coverage
